title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-1.6 - Content of notice of appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-1.6 - Content of notice of appeal

State Regulations

The notice of appeal, or request for review (these terms
being used synonymously), shall state the reasons on which the appeal is
taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
326-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
